serialization.name: Layout - Top/Over
serialization.description: 2 top-over-bottom panes in an adaptive layout grid.

strings.jsxtip: Select the view filter and refresh.
strings.jsxxml: <data jsxid="jsxroot"> <record jsxid="1" jsxtext="All" jsxexecute="downloadlist.service.call();"/> <record jsxid="2" jsxtext="Started" jsxexecute="downloadlistStarted.service.call();"/> <record jsxid="3" jsxtext="Seeding" jsxexecute="downloadlistSeeding.service.call();"/><record jsxid="4" jsxtext="Stopped" jsxexecute="downloadlistStopped.service.call();"/> <record jsxid="5" jsxtext="Hashing " jsxexecute="downloadlistHashing.service.call();"/> </data>

strings.jsxtip: Contains actions on the torrent list (start,stop,hash,erase).
strings.jsxxml: <data jsxid="jsxroot"> <record jsxid="1" jsxtext="Start" jsxexecute="start.service.call();"/> <record jsxid="2" jsxtext="Stop" jsxexecute="stop.service.call();"/> <record jsxid="3" jsxtext="Hash" jsxexecute="hash.service.call();"/> <record jsxid="4" jsxtext="Erase" jsxexecute="erase.service.call();"/> </data>

<data jsxid="jsxroot"> <record jsxid="1" jsxtext="Set Off Priority " jsxexecute="SetTorrentPrioOff.service.call();"/> <record jsxid="2" jsxtext="Set Low Priority" jsxexecute="SetTorrentPrioLow.service.call();"/> <record jsxid="3" jsxtext="Set Normal Priority" jsxexecute="SetTorrentPrioNormal.service.call();"/> <record jsxid="4" jsxtext="Set High Priority" jsxexecute="SetTorrentPrioHigh.service.call();"/> </data>

strings.jsxtip: Contains actions on the file listing.
strings.jsxxml: <data jsxid="jsxroot"> <record jsxid="1" jsxtext="Do not download" jsxexecute="SetFilePrioOff.service.call();"/> <record jsxid="2" jsxtext="Set Normal Priority" jsxexecute="SetFilePrioNormal.service.call();"/> <record jsxid="3" jsxtext="Set High Priority" jsxexecute="SetFilePrioHigh.service.call();"/> </data>

strings.jsxtip: Upload rate in kilo bytes per second.
Setup the connection to the webserver.
See rTorrent settings, change total upload/download.

strings.jsxxml: <data jsxid="jsxroot"><record jsxid="2" jsximg="" jsxtext="2"/><record jsxid="3" jsximg="" jsxtext="3"/><record jsxid="4" jsximg="" jsxtext="4"/><record jsxid="5" jsximg="" jsxtext="5"/><record jsxid="10" jsximg="" jsxtext="10"/><record jsxid="15" jsximg="" jsxtext="15"/><record jsxid="20" jsximg="" jsxtext="20"/><record jsxid="30" jsximg="" jsxtext="30"/><record jsxid="60" jsximg="" jsxtext="60"/> </data>

events.jsxexecute: jsx3.out('mycheck','the jsxexecute method was fired for checkbox, ' + this.getId());

strings.jsxtip: Add a torrent from an URL
See tracker info, url, hash, torrent info.
See the listing of files in the torrent.
See the list of active peers.
